main_definition: A drink, typically consumed by humans, that provides hydration or refreshment.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Any liquid intended for consumption (not including water)
meanings_and_examples.example: I enjoy a good cup of coffee as my beverage in the morning.
She prefers to have her tea or other non-alcoholic beverages during social gatherings.
At the convenience store, I bought a cola and a bottle of soda as my favorite beverages.
On cold winter nights, nothing warms me up more than a cup of hot chocolate or tea.
